content: वरिष्ठ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Best, most excellent, most distinguished or pre-eminent. {@--2@} Largest, greatest. {@--3@} Widest. {@--4@} Heaviest. {@--5@} Worst, most wicked; (<ab>superl.</ab> of उरु <ab>q. v.</ab>) --ष्ठः {@--1@} The francoline partridge. {@--2@} The orange tree. --ष्ठं {@--1@} Copper. {@--2@} Pepper.
